body.p: Currently BUSMASTER can be used as slave to Respond to Master Requests and to Monitor the LIN messages.The following steps are required to Configure the BUSMASTER for Transmit\Receive the LIN Messages.
To Transmit\Receive the LIN Messages BUSMASTER has to be configured with LIN Baud Rate and Version.Refer Cluster Configuration Section for more Information.
BUSMASTER can be connected to Physical LIN Network using LIN Controller.Refer Controller Selection section for more Information.
LIN Slave Messages Can be transmitted over LIN network using LIN Tx Window.Refer LIN Transmission Window Section for more information.
Once the Cluster & Controllers are properly configured BUSMASTER can be connected to Network using LIN->Connect. menu or the LIN Connect Tool bar Button as shown in following figure.
BUSMASTER Message Window can be used to monitor the LIN messages of LIN Network.Refer LIN Message Window section for more information.
